title: AI Story Generator
description: A single-page web app that generates stories using AI.

pages.name: Home
pages.purpose: User enters input and clicks 'Generate Story' button.

pages.name: Story Preview
pages.purpose: Generated story is displayed for user review.

ui_components: Input Field (for user to enter prompts)

interactions.description: Send user input to AI model and retrieve generated story.
Allow user to copy, save, or share the generated story.

acceptance_criteria: The app generates a coherent and engaging story based on user input.
The UI is intuitive and easy to use.
The app handles errors and edge cases gracefully.
